toc_entry.title: The Mythic Rise Of Billy Don Moyers
toc_entry.description: A small-town boy’s journey from Texas to the cosmos.

toc_entry.title: Can’t Win For Losing
toc_entry.description: When San Antonio’s Memorial Minutemen took on a crosstown rival, all they had to lose was their chance to go down in history as Texas’ worst high school football team.

toc_entry.title: Billie Sol Estes Has A Deal For You
toc_entry.description: The guy whose name is synonymous with swindling is finally a free man —but it may not last.

toc_entry.title: Creature Comforts
toc_entry.description: Horns, hooves, and hides for the home.

toc_entry.title: So You Re Stuck At the Airport
toc_entry.description: Your jet’s lagging. You’re sick of reading and people-watching. Cheer up: just a gate away might be great chili, a shopping mall, or even a place to pray.

toc_entry.title: Cowboy Songs
toc_entry.description: Five favorites from the wide-open spaces, in words and pictures.

toc_entry.title: Hotter’n Hell
toc_entry.description: Cycling a hundred miles is a hard enough way to spend a Saturday. It’s even harder in Wichita Falls in August.

toc_entry.title: John the Catalyst
toc_entry.subtitle: Politics
toc_entry.description: In his new book, James Reston, Jr., tries unsuccessfully to make John Connally larger than life.

toc_entry.title: Body Count
toc_entry.subtitle: Education
toc_entry.description: To a small rural school district, the size of a teacher’s family can spell the difference between money in the bank and fiscal disaster.

toc_entry.title: Sound Investments
toc_entry.subtitle: Classical Music
toc_entry.description: Two Texas orchestras bid for international acclaim: the Dallas symphony with a cushy, costly new home and the Houston symphony with a creative new conductor.

toc_entry.title: Tv Guides
toc_entry.subtitle: Business
toc_entry.description: Daytime television isn’t just for housewives anymore; car salesmen, cops, and stockbrokers are tuning in to business networks.

toc_entry.title: Behind the Lines
toc_entry.description: From Sin Street to Fun Street.

toc_entry.title: The Roar Of the Crowd
toc_entry.description: Hooker strikes out; Texas screenwriters hit Hollywood pay dirt; Baptists bicker over Bible book.

toc_entry.title: Around the State
toc_entry.description: A selective guide to amusements and events.

toc_entry.title: Reporter
toc_entry.description: Conquest Airlines flies where few have gone before; baby boomers get their acts together; a coach and a student rap it up in Brazosport.

toc_entry.title: State Secrets
toc_entry.description: What Donald Trump means to American Airlines, win or lose; oil and landowners don’t mix; why it’s hard to do the right thing about school finance.
